arguments.value: RM: unknown  method

devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>Olivier Van Den Biggelaar - <olivier@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Module to manage the recovery of a wallet owner. Recovery is executed by a consensus of the wallet's guardians and takes 24 hours before it can be finalized. Once finalised the ownership of the wallet is transfered to a new address.

addModule(address,address).details: Adds a module to a wallet. First checks that the module is registered.

cancelOwnershipTransfer(address).details: Lets the owner cancel an ongoing ownership transfer procedure.

cancelRecovery(address).details: Lets the owner cancel an ongoing recovery procedure. Must be confirmed by N guardians, where N = ((Nb Guardian + 1) / 2) - 1.

params._data: The data for the relayed transaction
params._gasLimit: The gas limit to use for the gas refund.
params._gasPrice: The gas price to use for the gas refund.
params._nonce: The nonce used to prevent replay attacks.
params._signatures: The signatures as a concatenated byte array.

executeOwnershipTransfer(address,address.details: Lets the owner start the execution of the ownership transfer procedure. Once triggered the ownership transfer is pending for the security period before it can be finalised.

params._newOwner: The address to which ownership should be transferred.

executeRecovery(address,address).details: Lets the guardians start the execution of the recovery procedure. Once triggered the recovery is pending for the security period before it can be finalised. Must be confirmed by N guardians, where N = ((Nb Guardian + 1) / 2).

params._recovery: The address to which ownership should be transferred.

finalizeOwnershipTransfer(address).details: Finalizes an ongoing ownership transfer procedure if the security period is over. The method must be called during the confirmation window and can be called by anyone to enable orchestration.

finalizeRecovery(address).details: Finalizes an ongoing recovery procedure if the security period is over. The method is public and callable by anyone to enable orchestration.

getNonce(address).details: Gets the current nonce for a wallet.

getRecovery(address).details: Gets the details of the ongoing recovery procedure if any.

init(address).details: Inits the module for a wallet by logging an event. The method can only be called by the wallet itself.

recoverToken(address).details: Utility method enbaling anyone to recover ERC20 token sent to the module by mistake and transfer them to the Module Registry.

devdoc.title: RecoveryManager
